reviews.text: Joel Transport was on time, 4 friendly Gentleman pitched at my gate smiling.  Frans came up to me and introduced himself in a very focused gesture.  Within 30 minutes my whole flat was loaded and on it's way.  Thank you Joel Transport and Monarch Moving Julie and Nadine for this awesome, fast and friendly service.  Nellie Denysschen

All round amazing service. Told me they'd arrive between 9 and 10, they arrived promptly at 9.  They don't charge extra to secure your goods with protection(blankets and padding). Then they had to wait while I was caught on the n1 for an hour and they unpacked and set up my furniture. They even reassembled my dressing table for me. No mess, no fuss. They are remarkable.

Handled our move very professionally without incident. All staff members were very friendly and efficient whilst taking care of our possessions. Arrived on time and worked tirelessly the entire day all the time with a smile on their faces. Our appreciation to the crew that moved us.
Joel Transport was recommended by a colleague, and the experience was stress free. Staff were very helpful and efficient, and they did an excellent job. Thank you, I will definitely use them again.
